parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.
From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To raise, lift up. From epi and airo; to raise up.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come down, come to; To be unfit, proper. From kata and heko; to reach to, i.e. becoming.
To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
